questions.question_text: Draw a simple network diagram showing 4 computers connected to a router.

questions.correct_answer: Flowchart with Start, Input number, Decision (>0?), Output positive/negative, End

drawing_template.instructions: Use oval for start/end, diamond for decision, rectangle for process

questions.question_text: CPU stands for _______ Processing Unit.
What is the difference between a sequence and a loop in programming?
questions.correct_answer: A sequence runs instructions one after another in order. A loop repeats instructions multiple times until a condition is met.

questions.question_text: A shop sells items at these prices: RM5, RM8, RM12, RM15. Write the formula to find the average price.
questions.correct_answer: =AVERAGE(A1:A4) if prices are in cells A1 to A4, which equals RM10

Explain the difference between RAM and ROM.
questions.correct_answer: RAM (Random Access Memory) is temporary memory that loses data when powered off. ROM (Read Only Memory) is permanent memory that keeps data even when powered off.

Explain the difference between system software and application software. Give one example of each.
questions.correct_answer: System software (e.g., Windows) controls hardware and runs the computer. Application software (e.g., Word) helps users do specific tasks like writing documents.

questions.question_text: Give three examples of input devices and explain what each does.
questions.correct_answer: 1. Keyboard - allows typing text. 2. Mouse - allows pointing and clicking. 3. Microphone - allows recording sound.

questions.question_text: Why is it important to update your operating system regularly?
questions.correct_answer: Updates fix security problems, add new features, improve performance, and fix bugs that could cause the computer to malfunction.

questions.question_text: List 3 rules for staying safe online.
questions.correct_answer: 1. Never share personal information. 2. Use strong passwords. 3. Tell an adult if something makes you uncomfortable. 4. Only visit trusted websites.
